mapper.select: select id from t_measures where id = #{name}
select id, start_time, end_time, sojourn from t_measures where id LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
select id, start_time, end_time, sojourn from t_measures
mapper.insert: insert into t_measures(id, start_time, end_time, sojourn) values(#{id}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{sojourn})
